s

Kevin Powell

Principal Front End Developer
Eightshapes since 2014

Kevin knows how to build design systems (and the tooling required to build them) across all major front end platforms. He's also built popular open-source tooling for text cropping and checking color contrast for accessibilty.

Kevin has architected and/or worked on design systems at Morningstar (2017-2018), REI, JDRF, USAC, NetApp, Discovery Education, Target, Amgen, IDEXX, Fidelity, Marriott, Yahoo and Liberty Mutual.
